content: external channels, all logical partitions (LPARs) in all channel subsystems can access the adapter. In IBM z16 A02 or IBM z16 AGZ, up to 40 LPARs are supported per adapter. Accessing the adapter requires a setup in the image profile for each partition. The adapter must be in the candidate list.
